name: WordleFall
description:
WordleFall is a game about making 5-letter words from letters that fall from the top of the screen. How many words do you know?

You can make words horizontally or vertically, and there is always a possibility to get at least 500 points in each puzzle.

How to play:
Arrow keys: Move the letter left and right.
Spacebar: Place the letter fast.
X: Reserve the letter.

Mobile controls:
Tap left/right screen: Move the letter left and right.
Tap bottom of screen: Place the letter fast.
Tap reserve text: Reserve the letter.
